Uses of Package
orego.core

  • Packages that use orego.core 
    Package Description
    orego.book
    Classes dealing with the opening book, which is generated automatically from a large collection of games by strong human players.
    orego.core
    Classes dealing with the board, colors, coordinates, etc.
    orego.decision  
    orego.experiment
    Classes for running and analyzing experiments.
    orego.heuristic  
    orego.mcts
    Player classes implementing Monte-Carlo tree search.
    orego.patternanalyze  
    orego.play
    Interface and classes from which players descend.
  • Classes in orego.core used by orego.book 
    Class and Description
    Board
    Holds the current state of the board, allows moves to be played, etc.
  • Classes in orego.core used by orego.core 
    Class and Description
    Board
    Holds the current state of the board, allows moves to be played, etc.
    SuperKoTable
    Set of Zobrist hashes (longs) from previous board positions.
